review: Great purchase! I got this for my bedroom TV which isn't a smart TV. I wanted to be able to watch Netflix shows while hubby played his PS3 on the living room TV. Works perfectly! Also took this on vacation and plugged into hotel TV. That was best decision. I could watch the movies and TV shows I wanted to  on my timetable.
author: Library Lady "Librarian"

review: Love my Fire Stick. I have a rather sketchy "high speed" internet connection yet fire stick is better able to keep a connection and play than my more expensive Roku device. And clever Amazon, they made Prime slightly easier to access than Netflix so now I am watching more on Prime ;)
